name: Grilled Tomato Thyme
description: This Grilled Tomato Thyme recipe is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a healthy, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar meal. With fresh ingredients like tomatoes and thyme, it's an ideal choice for anyone seeking healthy recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the tomatoes under cold water and pat them dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the fresh thyme over the cut sides of the tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Place the tomatoes cut-side down on the grill and cook for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Turn the tomatoes over and grill for another 4 minutes until they are soft and the skins are slightly charred.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
